column5: 5,000 sq.ft, 5 bedroom, 5.5 bath log cabin on the San Saba River. 4 wood burning fireplaces keep you warm in the winter with a wrap around porch perched above the beautiful and refreshing spring fed San Saba River. This home has 2 fully equipped kitchens. Sleep up to 17.  Perfect for family reunions, family vacations, church retreats, corporate retreats and weddings. We have something for everyone!
